      SuccessMessage BookshelfResource.addItemToUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi)
      Adds a new BookshelfItem with the given pi to the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the BookshelfItem could not be created (wrong pi)

      Adds a new BookshelfItem with the given pi, logid and page number to the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the BookshelfItem could not be created (wrong pi/logid/page)

      java.lang.Integer BookshelfResource.countSessionBookshelfItems()
      Counts the items contained in the session store bookshelf and returns the number as plain integer If no session store bookshelf exists, 0 is returned
      java.lang.Long BookshelfResource.countUserBookshelfItems(java.lang.Long id)
      Counts the items contained in the current user's bookshelf with the given id and returns the number as plain integer If no session store bookshelf exists, 0 is returned
      SuccessMessage BookshelfResource.deleteFromSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi)
      Deletes the bookshelf item with the given pi from the session store bookshelf This operation returns an object with the property "success: false" if the operation failed (usually because the object wasn't in the bookshelf to begin with).
      SuccessMessage BookshelfResource.deleteFromSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Deletes the bookshelf item with the given pi, logid and page number from the session store bookshelf This operation returns an object with the property "success: false" if the operation failed (usually because the object wasn't in the bookshelf to begin with).
      SuccessMessage BookshelfResource.deleteFromUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi)
      Removes a BookshelfItem with the given pi from the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the requested BookshelfItem is invalid (wrong pi)
